For those of you attending in person, the venue is at the Park Campus in Cheltenham.

Address:

> Elwes Teaching Centre (1a on the 2nd map below)<br>
> Park Campus<br>
> University of Gloucestershire<br>
> Cheltenham<br>
> GL50 2RH

Paid for parking is available on the campus. Alternatively there is free parking on the roads off from the campus.
